title.h2: Full Stack Web Developer & Web Designer

about.p: I am a full stack developer with a focus on the front-end, I have had the opportunity to work in eCommerce and food industries, where I worked with different technologies that I learned autonomously, I am passionate about everything related to interface and user experience. I like to provide companies with scalable projects to generate customer engagement. Thanks to my experience in projects I have developed skills such as creativity, problem-solving skills, and assertive communication that have allowed me to perform appropriately in collaborative workspaces and individual projects. I am interested in continuing my professional development in the tech industry, particularly as a web developer.

projects.piDescription: Henry Videogames is a web application that allows the user to visualize video games using the Rawg API, as well as their details (description, release date, genres, and platforms) and offers the possibility to add your own video games.
projects.foodifyDescription: Web application created to help restaurants to organize their tables, metrics, employees, and menu. I worked in the Frontend part of the team, where we used React.
